HomePortfolio.description1: This is my portfolio, where you can find some of the projects I've worked on,

description.p1: I'm passionate about the world of Web Development. With several years of experience, I've been able to acquire solid expertise in front-end and back-end programming.
description.p2: I specialize in the creation of web sites and applications. My technology stack includes modern technologies like React and Next.js, enabling me to develop fast, scalable solutions and create SSR (Server-Side Rendering) and SSG (Static Site Generation) components.
description.p3: If you're looking for someone who can turn your idea into a complete digital solution, don't hesitate to contact me. Let's work together to turn your ideas into reality!

q3.title: What are my rates?
q3.description: My rates vary according to the complexity of your project. Don't hesitate to contact me for a free personalized quote!

q4.title: How do I arrange accommodation?

politique.title: Privacy Policy
politique.description: Welcome to Vicktor Web Solution, accessible from www.vicktor-web-solution.com. We understand the importance of our visitors' privacy and are committed to safeguarding it. This privacy policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data.

collecte.title: Data Collected
collecte.description: We collect various types of data for various purposes to provide and improve our service to you.

donnees.title: Data Collected
donnees.description: We collect various types of data for various purposes to provide and improve our service to you.

personnelles.title: Personal Data
personnelles.description: While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you. Personal data may include, but is not limited to:

localisation.title: Location Data
localisation.description: We use location data to provide features of our Service, to improve and personalize our Service. You can enable or disable location services when you use our Service at any time, through your device settings.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Data
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device.

utilisation.title: Use of Data
utilisation.description: Vicktor Web Solution uses the collected data for various purposes:
utilisation.fournir: To provide and maintain our Service
utilisation.informations: To notify you about changes to our Service
utilisation.participer: To allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service when you choose to do so
utilisation.support: To provide customer care and support
utilisation.recueillir: To gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our Service
utilisation.surveiller: To monitor the usage of our Service
utilisation.detecter: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues
utilisation.description2: Upon your first visit to our site, a banner informs you of the presence of cookies and asks for your consent to their use. You have the option to accept or decline cookies used for tracking, performance, and analytics.

Securite.title: Data Security
Securite.description: The security of your data is important to us, but please remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

modifications.title: Changes to this privacy policy
modifications.description: We may update our privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page.
modifications.conseillons: We recommend that you check this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when posted on this page.

contactez.title: Contact us
contactez.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us :
